articles.author: Tom Westbrook, Alun John
articles.title: Asia shares hit 15-month high as traders wait for CPI - Reuters
articles.description: World shares marked time on Tuesday, holding just shy of record highs ahead of highly anticipated U.S. inflation data, while Japanese bonds were squeezed as the central bank pulled back a little on its bond buying programme.
